<h3 id="X38204">X(38204) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(7), X(9), X(10)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (b+c)*a^2+2*(b^2+6*b*c+c^2)*a-3*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38204) = 7*X(1)-X(12630) = X(7)+5*X(1698) = X(9)-4*X(3634) = 2*X(9)+X(30424) = X(10)+2*X(142) = X(10)-4*X(3826) = 2*X(10)+X(5542) = 5*X(10)-2*X(24393) = 5*X(10)+4*X(25557) = X(142)+2*X(3826) = 4*X(142)-X(5542) = 5*X(142)+X(24393) = 5*X(142)-2*X(25557) = 4*X(142)+X(38210) = 8*X(3634)+X(30424) = 4*X(3812)-X(30329) = 8*X(3826)+X(5542) = 10*X(3826)-X(24393) = 5*X(3826)+X(25557) = 4*X(3826)+X(38054) = 8*X(3826)-X(38210) = 2*X(38052)+X(38059)</b>
<p>X(38204) lies on these lines: {1,12630}, {2,165}, {7,1698}, {9,3634}, {10,141}, {144,19877}, {390,3624}, {392,4301}, {443,4297}, {515,38122}, {517,38171}, {519,38053}, {527,38094}, {528,19883}, {551,5853}, {740,29600}, {758,38206}, {954,4413}, {971,10175}, {1001,16408}, {1058,1125}, {1738,4356}, {1757,4896}, {2801,34122}, {2802,38205}, {2951,3091}, {3008,4349}, {3059,5439}, {3090,11372}, {3243,3626}, {3576,38149}, {3614,31391}, {3671,5692}, {3679,11038}, {3715,3982}, {3731,7613}, {3755,17245}, {3821,3986}, {3828,5850}, {3841,9843}, {3848,24386}, {3925,11019}, {3950,28522}, {4061,18139}, {4078,28516}, {4197,7705}, {4208,5732}, {4298,8732}, {4307,31183}, {4312,18230}, {4353,4859}, {5223,9780}, {5249,21060}, {5259,7676}, {5587,21151}, {5657,38036}, {5686,19875}, {5698,31253}, {5704,30330}, {5759,31423}, {5762,11231}, {5790,38030}, {5805,6684}, {5843,38179}, {5845,38194}, {5847,38186}, {5851,38216}, {5852,38217}, {5856,38207}, {5857,38208}, {5880,6666}, {5886,38121}, {6172,19876}, {6702,10427}, {7679,30379}, {7989,36991}, {8227,35514}, {8236,25055}, {9956,31657}, {10172,38108}, {10384,10589}, {10392,17606}, {11108,11495}, {11362,20330}, {12447,28629}, {12512,16845}, {12571,17559}, {12573,19854}, {13159,18253}, {13405,26040}, {15481,22266}, {16593,25351}, {16853,18483}, {16857,28150}, {17282,19868}, {17612,25973}, {18398,34784}, {18482,31730}, {20103,25525}, {20790,21625}, {24248,25072}, {26446,38107}, {27475,29594}, {31191,38048}, {34123,38202}, {35262,37462}, {38028,38170}, {38041,38112}, {38042,38111}</p>
<p>
X(38204) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {2, 38052}, {10, 38054}, {551, 38201}, {3576, 38149}, {3679, 11038}, {5542, 38210}, {5587, 21151}, {5657, 38036}, {5790, 38030}, {5886, 38121}, {6173, 38057}, {10164, 38151}, {10175, 38123}, {11231, 38172}, {25055, 38092}, {26446, 38107}, {34123, 38202}, {38028, 38170}, {38041, 38112}, {38042, 38111}, {38053, 38200}<br>
X(38204) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (5542, 38054), (38037, 10171), (38054, 142), (38057, 3828), (38059, 2), (38108, 10172), (38130, 11231), (38158, 10175), (38210, 10)<br>
X(38204) = X(8)-Beth conjugate of-X(38210)<br>
X(38204) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (10, 142, 5542), (142, 3826, 10), (142, 24393, 25557), (1125, 2550, 30331), (1738, 29571, 4356), (3059, 5439, 20116), (15841, 21620, 5542), (38093, 38200, 38053)<br>
</p>
